Verify.definition: to confirm or substantiate by oath
Verify.origin: [Anglo-French verifier , from Medieval Latin verificare , from Latin verus true + -ficare to make]

-fyÂ·ing.definition: [Anglo-French, from Medieval Latin, from Latintrue +to make]

1.definition: to confirm or substantiate by oath, affidavit, or deposition [ a motion]

2.definition: to establish the truth, accuracy, or reality of
